revised_title: Chemical Analysis and Properties of White Lac
tldr: The author examines a wax-like substance called White Lac, collected from Madras by Dr. Anderson. The substance resembles the Pe-La of the Chinese and is produced by an insect similar to the cochineal insect. The author conducts various experiments to analyze its chemical properties, including its density, solubility, and reactions with other substances. The study aims to understand the potential uses of White Lac in dyeing and other applications.
